message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and importance to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $9500. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure an item valued at $10000 at a reduced price. I trust it will meet your expectations and contribute significantly to your needs. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
